# diagnostics: rets requires named results

! go build .
stderr 'rets requires named result parameters'

-- go.mod --
module example.com/decorators_shape_rets_diag

go 1.23

-- main.go --
package main

// Decorator uses rets but literal has unnamed results; should error.
func Bad(next func(int) int) func(int) int {
    return (func(x int) int { rets = next(args...); return rets }) as func(int) int
}
